#include <stdio.h>
#define max 100
void merge(long long int a[],long long int t[],long long int low1,long long int up1,long long int low2,long long int up2);
void copy(long long int a[],long long int t[],long long int low,long long int up);
void mergesort(long long int a[],long long int low,long long int up){
	long long int mid;
	long long int t[max];
	if(low<up){
	mid = (low+up)/2;
	mergesort(a,low,mid);
	mergesort(a,mid+1,up);
	merge(a,t,low,mid,mid+1,up);
	copy(a,t,low,up);
}}
void copy(long long int a[],long long int t[],long long int low,long long int up){
	long long int p;
	for( p=low;p<=up;p++){
		a[p]=t[p];
	}
}
void merge(long long int a[],long long int t[],long long int low1,long long int up1,long long int low2,long long int up2){
	long long int i=low1;
	long long int j=low2;
	long long int k=low1;
	while((i<=up1 )&& (j<=up2)){
		if(a[i]<=a[j]){
			t[k++]=a[i++];
		}
		else{
			t[k++]=a[j++];
		}}
		while(i<=up1)
	t[k++]=a[i++];
	while(j<=up2)
	t[k++]=a[j++];
}
int main(void) {
	long long int t,n,sum,i;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	for(i=1;i<=t;i++){
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		long long int a[n],j;
		for(j=0;j<n;j++){
			scanf("%lld",&a[j]);
		}
		mergesort(a,0,n-1);
	sum=a[n-1]+a[n-2]+a[n-3];
	printf("Case %lld: %lld\n",i,sum);
	}
	return 0;
}
